text:
@chrislhayes It is telling that GOP is shouting from the rooftops that this reaction the the coronavirus is overreaction and people should just wash hands and forget about it but:
Ted Cruz=Self Quarantine 
Paul Gosar= Self Quarantine 
Also nice that their government funded healthcare pays
